description: A pleasant walk around Sunshine Meadows to the Monarch Viewpoint and then right along the gentle Wawa Ridge with great views all the way.We found Pika enjoying the sun at the top too!
directions: Start at Sunshine Ski Resort (take the Bus or Gondola from the parking lot, or be prepared for a 6.5 km dusty walk on a gravel road).
title: Wawa Ridge
